title: Momma's meat jambalaya
description: The beauty of this dish is that you can substitute or add whatever you like. It's a great way to use up what's in your kitchen. A simple version of a well-loved dish.
ingredients: 450g/1 lb chicken pieces, on or off the bone
2 Scotch Bonnet or other hot chilli peppers, 1 red, 1 yellow, chopped
mixed vegetables, such as carrots, peas, green beans, sprouts, courgettes, chopped (frozen vegetables will suffice)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
